explains: v. <正式>阻止，妨碍（preclude sb. from）

sentences.en: That will preclude him from escaping.
sentences.cn: 那将阻止他逃走，那将使他无法逃走。

sentences.en: Black holes are dense, but their event horizons preclude observations.
sentences.cn: 黑洞密度足够高，但是他们的视界阻止了观察者。

sentences.en: A poor choice could preclude acquisition if the technology were too esoteric.
sentences.cn: 如果技术过于深奥的话，糟糕的选择可能会妨碍到被收购。
